Gram Panchayat/Janpad Panchyat for rural areas. 
 1. Nagar Nigam/Nagar Panchayat/Nagar Parishad for urban areas 

1. On receipt of the application, the application will be sent by the designated officer to the Gram Panchayat in the rural area and to the urban body in the urban area for investigation.
